title: Game not launching. need help
body:
Decided to use a laptop temporarily but after updating league, the match wont start after  champion select. which resulted me being afk. when trying to reconnect had the  dx3dx9 39 dll error. restored my computer from the restore point and game still doesnt launch. also  doesnt say the error anymore. this is the log from the computer. i think this is the right one.
https://pastebin.com/YqZEWSBV

P.S this is info from directX
https://pastebin.com/MtmuJXrE

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

Try also **updating your [DirectX](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35)** and your **graphics card drivers**.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
